description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: This resource provides the target, request and response, and action details for an action to be performed by the target on or about existing resources.

action.description: The type of processing action being requested, for example Reversal, Readjudication, StatusRequest,PendedRequest.

ruleset.description: The version of the style of resource contents. This should be mapped to the allowable profiles for this and supporting resources.

originalRuleset.description: The style (standard) and version of the original material which was converted into this resource.

created.description: The date when this resource was created.

targetIdentifier.description: The organization which is the target of the request.

targetReference.description: The organization which is the target of the request.

providerIdentifier.description: The practitioner who is responsible for the action specified in thise request.

providerReference.description: The practitioner who is responsible for the action specified in thise request.

organizationIdentifier.description: The organization which is responsible for the action speccified in thise request.

organizationReference.description: The organization which is responsible for the action speccified in thise request.

requestIdentifier.description: Reference of resource which is the target or subject of this action.

requestReference.description: Reference of resource which is the target or subject of this action.

responseIdentifier.description: Reference of a prior response to resource which is the target or subject of this action.

responseReference.description: Reference of a prior response to resource which is the target or subject of this action.

nullify.description: If true remove all history excluding audit.

reference.description: A reference to supply which authenticates the process.

item.description: List of top level items to be re-adjudicated, if none specified then the entire submission is re-adjudicated.

include.description: Names of resource types to include.

exclude.description: Names of resource types to exclude.

period.description: A period of time during which the fulfilling resources would have been created.

allOf.description: This resource provides the target, request and response, and action details for an action to be performed by the target on or about existing resources.
